description: Demolition of existing supermarket; 14,112sqm (GEA) replacement supermarket (Use Class A1) (Ground and First Floor beneath Blocks E, F, G and K); 8,323sqm (GEA) flexible non-food retail (Use Class A1 -A4) (Ground and First Floor beneath Blocks I, Hand J); 84 residential units (use class C3) (Within Block G, 8 storeys); Basement parking; New bus stop, bus layover and servicing access; Formation of a new vehicular and pedestrian access and means of access and circulation within the site, new private and public open space and landscaping; and Associated plant and servicing.
